Text:
No comments? I would at least like to know whether it works for you guys or not?

P.S.
The specific version is 1.7.0
It doesn't seem to work with 64-bit applications since the bdcap64.dll-file isn't also cracked. It doesn't recognise applications that runs 64-bits systems

In my case, I run Minecraft on 64-bit Java, and I have to since my 64-bit operating system have decided not to run minecraft smoothly on 32-bit Java. I have tried to find a crack but can't even find the crack you have included here. So it would be really great if you could manage to get hold of a cracked bdcap64.dll. Then this torrent would be the torrent of the year (for me at least ;P)
This works fine on 64bit windows. Just delete bdcap64.dll and it will not complain. Found this trick on another website. :)

@Dislikeyou
You won't be able to record 64-bit applications. Deleting bdcap64.dll doesn't do shit.

@TNC
Have you tried installing it as a 32bit (86x) application on your pc? I cant test whether or not that works since I dont have a 64-bit system =/

@miguelsz3
Bandicam is a 32bit application, so you cant install it as anything else, no mather what format you're system is running. And for all I can see their solution to this is to have a bdcap32.dll and a bdcap64.dll so that bandicam can read both formats of applications. And since only the 32bit .dll is cracked the program will never be able to record 64bit applications.

@Lwc
Yah, I kinda knew that would be the case. *Sigh* Gonna go search for 64-bit crack agian.

P.S.
Damn that was a fast response.
Thank you so much! FRAPS was not working for me at all, and then I found this! I owe you my life! :D Seeding now, just for you, you bad bitch!
I don't understand replace what files. Is this even a registered version of Bandicam.

What? How the hell could it be a registered version of bandicam? Its a "cracked" version. The Instructions are damn easy to follow >.>

Anywho, replace the file "bdcap32.dll" in your programs folder with the one in the extracted folder "Bandicam 1.7.rar"

 Then delete "bdcap64.dll"
i cant record audio.. please help

This doesn't work for me on Win7 x64.  If I leave bcap64.dll in the directory running the program does nothing, it won't launch and there is no error message.  If i remove bcap64.dll I get an error telling me the program is invalid and needs to be resintalled.

Good Torrent guys easy to follow instructions, works great.

Many Thanks to the uploader!
